named-native-query.name: SorteioPremioModel.buscaTodos
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_SOP_SORTEIO_PREMIO order by sor_codsorteio

named-native-query.name: SorteioPremioModel.buscaPorSorteioTipoPremio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_SOP_SORTEIO_PREMIO where sor_codsorteio = ?1 and sop_tppremio = ?2

named-native-query.name: SorteioPremioModel.buscaQuantidadePremiosPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select count(*) from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_SOP_SORTEIO_PREMIO where sor_codsorteio = ?1
